x={+/- 10} PREMISES x×x=100 ASSUMPTIONS Let x=the number CALCULATIONS +/- x^2=100 +/- √(x^2=100) x= +/- 10 PROOF If x=+/-10, then the equations +/- x^2=100 +/- 10^2=100, which shows (-10)^2=100 and (+10)^2=100 and 100=100 prove the root (zero) x=+/-10 of the equation +/- x^2=100 C.H.
